title: The Bachelorette Party
description: New Orleans: live music, endless drinks, brightly-coloured attractions, the perfect place for a party…The bride-to-beThe best friendThe cousinThe mother-in-lawThe sisterThe groom’s friendThe bachelorette begins on a Friday night; all six women are excited for a chance to escape their everyday lives. But then friendly rivalries turn vicious, and a game of truth or dare turns deadly.By the end of the weekend one of them will be dead…
author: Carissa Ann Lynch
